The dresses from this vendor are very well made, the material is very soft and the colors are beautiful. I kept 2 other dresses that fit and we are very happy with them. 评论概述: Love this dress after I made changes
评论详情: I ordered the dress in the golden color size medium. It's pretty true to size, but seems a little snug across the bodice The fabric is super soft and easy to iron. One of the reviews mentioned that there were two sets of strings and tassels and it was too much. I totally agree! I removed the bottom set of ties and tassels and hand stitched up the front a little bit so I feel more comfortable wearing it. Reading the washing instructions tag was very challenging because it is so tiny. I took a photo of the tag with washing instructions then had Google translate from Chinese to English. It is: hand wash warm water and flat dry. Use a medium heat iron. I wish it had pockets. I absolutely love the border print on the sleeves and the hem of the dress. The piping across the bodice gives it a nice detail. It is not see through even outdoors. I think it's a great dress for the price.

Buyer beware I had high hopes for this dress. I am perplexed as to how it garnered so many posirive reviews; reviews that influenced ne to make this purchase. Perhaps i recieved a defective garment. The sizing was completly off and not in accordance with size chart. The top part was way too small to fit a 40d bust. The opening at front is too low and does not close. The dress just hangs like a potato sack without any drape. Certainly not worth the price. It was too much hassle to return so it was just a loss fir me.

It is going yo be perfect for traveling to hot weather locations. It was 95F here today and it felt nice and cool to wear. It arrived very wrinkled, as it is cotton. But I threw it in the clothes dryer with a damp towel for about 10 minutes and it came out with just barely any wrinkles. This alone is going to make it a good travel dress.  I am 74 years old, with a nice pair of sandals And a small purse, this is going to become a major staple in my closet for hot days.
Very nice lite weight fabric with a beautiful print.  The XXL fit well. I am normal a 2x on the bottom and a little smaller on the top. Love the flow of this dress.

I love this dress, but the bust really pulls;  the sizing is correct. I have to be wary of ordering clothes from Asian countries as the cut (especially for curvier women) usually doesn't work.  I even tried a tight camisole to flatten the girls out and it didn't work.

评论概述: Beautiful Dress BUT too short in the front
评论详情: I love the material and how it looks.  I had ordered an XL but am sending back.  The XL fit everywhere except where the skirt is attached to the top, it hit me right in the middle of my breast.  Apparently you need to be pretty flat chested for this dress.  I had plenty room in the top but the fit was just weird.  I reordered this in XXL which is huge and a little longer in the top.  I loved the dress and realize it is made to fit loose.  It's REALLY Loose.  I will use this dress a  pattern to make a couple more.  Too bad it's made in China as the chinese people are much smaller people and they apprenently don't understand US sizing.  I love the flow of the dress (Viscose).  I should learn my lesson because I end up buying dresses according to the size chart and they don't fit or bigger dress size that is huge than I actually wear when I order from China.  Buyer beware if you are bustie, this dress more than likely will not fit you.  Smaller bust will be okay.  Wish it was a good fit.
Super cute and very comfy- happy with this dress

评论概述: Inaccurate Sizing Guide BUT Great Quality
评论详情: I ordered a 16/18 (XL) to give myself a lot of extra room but again, these Chinese manufacturers have inaccurate sizing guides. The XL size dress fits like a 12/14, which should be a large. I ordered another color and went up two sizes (see pic). So just go up 2 sizes because it might shrink after washing. I bought a much bigger size and it fits great.  Otherwise, the design, colors, and quality of fabric are beautiful. The fabric drapes well. THE FABRIC IS GREAT QUALITY FABRIC!!  NOTE: this style of dress works better for “pear-shaped” bodies and so you might not need a bigger size.
